actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a certain river in the State of Alabama for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Designates a stream described in this Act located near Cahaba, Alabama, for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system. (Adds 16 U.S.C. 1276(28))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a certain river in the State of Alabama for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system.
